events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering roles, focusing on software development and system design.
A recruiter specialized in developer positions has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process from now on.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, focusing on your engineering background and technical skills.
Thank you for promptly responding to our initial screening feedback; your enthusiasm for the software engineer role is appreciated.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developer team to assess your coding and system design expertise.
